learning_outcomes.description: Have an advanced understanding of the foundations of statistical learning, as well as providing concrete algorithms to solve statistical problems.
Provide proofs of fundamental theorems in statistics.
Implement python applications for statistical learning.
Confidently carry out Monte Carlo experiments.
Apply a range of  statistical learning algorithms.

assessments.task_description: The assignments will be on work covered in the lectures.
assessments.deferral_or_extension: You may be able to apply for an extension.
assessments.late_submission: A penalty of 10% of the maximum possible mark will be deducted per 24 hours from time submission is due for up to 7 days. After 7 days, you will receive a mark of 0.
assessments.additional_info: You may be able to apply for an extension.
